# primaryItem

**Instance Property**

The player item that represents the primary content.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var primaryItem: AVPlayerItem? { get }
```

## Discussion

The item must contain an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset] that provides intrinsic mappings from its timeline to realtime dates.

## Accessing player items

- **templateItems**: An array of player item configurations to use as templates for player items that play interstitial content.

items.description: An array of player item configurations to use as templates for player items that play interstitial content.
